agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Corrections TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess Wednesday, February 6, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. James White The committee will meet for an organizational hearing to hear invited testimony. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
